yin2
HSK 5: 银,銀
HSK 6: 吟
Freq: 9542
訡，读yín，古同“吟”。
訡, pronounce yín, the same as "Yin" in ancient times.

訡字的基本解释

訡
yín
古同“吟”。

訡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yín］
［《廣韻》魚金切，平侵，疑。］
［《廣韻》宜禁切，去沁，疑。］
亦作“噖1”。“欽3”的被通假字。亦作“訡1”。
(1)吟咏；诵读。
(2)指抒写。
(3)叹息；呻吟。
(4)鸣，叫。
(5)吹奏。
(6)谓语音模糊。
(7)古代诗歌体裁的一种。
(8)常用指与作诗或诗人有关的事物。参见“吟壇”、“吟肩”、“吟鞭”。
(9)弹奏古琴的指法。吟法为：左手按弦，在某一徽位作短距离的往复摆动。
(10)象声词。
(11)姓。唐有嘉州刺史吟约。见《正字通·口部》。
[②]［yǐn］
亦作“噖2”。
见“噤吟”。
[③]［jìn］
通“噤1”。
闭口。

訡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　訡； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1150第04
【說文】同吟。【禮·學記】呻其佔畢。【註】呻吟也。又作訡。　又人名。希訡、與訡，見【宋史·宗室表】。

訡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
訡字的起名意思

古同“吟”。

訡
Basic explanation of words
訡
yín
Gu Tong "Yin".
訡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yín］
["Guangyun" fish gold cut, flat invasion, suspicious. ]
["Guangyun" should be forbidden to cut, go to Qin, doubt. ]
Also known as "噖1". "Qin 3" was passed falsely. Also known as "訡1".
(1) Chanting; recitation.
(2) Refers to writing.
(3) Sigh; groan.
(4) Tweet, call.
(5) Playing.
(6) It is said that the voice is blurred.
(7) A genre of ancient poetry.
(8) Often refers to things related to poems or poets. See "Yin Tan", "Yin Shoulder", "Yin Whip".
(9) Fingering of playing the guqin. The chanting method is: pressing the string with the left hand and swinging back and forth for a short distance in a certain emblem.
(10) Onomatopoeia.
(11) Last name. Tang has Jiazhou governor Yinyue. See "Zhengzitong·koubu".
[②]［yǐn］
Also known as "噖2".
See "silence".
[③]［jìn］
Pass "Quiet 1".
Shut up.
訡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　訡; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 1150 04
[Said Wen] Tong Yin. 【Rite·School Records】Qiqizhan. [Note] Moaning too. Also made 訡.　Another name. See the [Song History·Clan List] for Xixu, and Yuxu.
